script.line: Oh my gosh!
Bark bark!
It worked! Aw Minty! You're back!
Wow! I feel great, too! I usually get a bit of a sore neck after I do that.
Thanks for the advice, Doc!
Eh, no problem. Just happy to help.
And for what it's worth, that was a real good move. You ever think about becoming a wrestler?
ALL. THE. TIME.
What? You didn't mention that!
Yeah, I'm kinda whimsical.
Well, with skills like that you oughta do it! You got a real bright future, kid.
Maybe I do! But... I don't suppose you'd be willing to... coach me? You're pretty good at it.
Me? A coach?
I don't know if I'd be any good...
I think you'd be great, Doc! You coached me through making that sandwich!
Hm. Guess I did. Yeah, you know what? I'd love a little side gig. And wrestling's pretty fun, too!
Sure, I'll be your coach!
Bark!
Anyhow, I gotta get back to my stall and get started on my next batch o' sandos.
Would you...maybe want some help with that? Little skill trade?
Sure! That'd be great! Prota, you wanna come hang out?
Maybe later. For now, I should get Minty back to my family.
Loud and clear! Have a great night!
Yeah! Thanks for everything, Prota!
